content.raw: Updated to remove redundant Qt imports and resolve merge conflict (which was in queue.py, in new_rep_name()). Given the plugin management feature has been implemented by @PhyNerd, this should be OK to merge (I've tested and it is disabled by default, and is loaded if you edit labconfig to enable it).
